publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4604 Jamie Hepburn: 50th Anniversary of Sacred Heart Parish, Cumbernauldâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the parish of Sacred Heart, Cumbernauld, on celebrating its 50th anniversary in 2009; further congratulates the parish priest, Monsignor Pat Osborne, on the golden jubilee of his ordination to the priesthood, and recognises the important role that the parish and other churches in Cumbernauld have played in developing the community spirit of the new town in the years since its foundation. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Aileen Campbell, Christina McKelvie, Bob Doris, Alasdair Allan, Gil Paterson, Bill Kidd, Maureen Watt, Sandra White, Stuart McMillan
S3M-4604 50th Anniversary of Sacred Heart Parish, Cumbernauld (lodged on 15 July 2009) Michael Matheson*
